turns.prompt_text: Jawb b tahia. Say a greeting like Salam 3likom or Salam.
turns.prompt_darija: Salam. Qul tahia b-darija, bhal Salam 3likom.
turns.hint_darija: Qul: Salam 3likom. Tqdar tgul Salam ghir bsif.

turns.prompt_text: Kidayr. Answer how you are. For example Labas or Bikher or Hamdullah.
turns.prompt_darija: Kidayr? Jawb b-kelma sghira: Labas, bikher, wla hamdullah.
tips: Mzyan. Goul jumla kamla: Ana bikher, hamdullah.
